tool.command:
gatk3_wrapper.py --max_jvm_heap_fraction "1" #for $bam_count, $input_bam in enumerate( $reference_source.input_bams ): -d "-I" "${input_bam.input_bam}" "${input_bam.input_bam.ext}" "gatk_input_${bam_count}" #if str( $input_bam.input_bam.metadata.bam_index ) != "None": -d "" "${input_bam.input_bam.metadata.bam_index}" "bam_index" "gatk_input_${bam_count}" ##hardcode galaxy ext type as bam_index #end if #end for -p 'java -jar "\$GATK3_PATH/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar" -T "DiagnoseTargets" \$GATK3_SITE_OPTIONS ## \$GATK3_NUM_THREADS ##-et "NO_ET" -K "/data/galaxy/appList/GenomeAnalysisTK-2.0-36-gf5c1c1a/gatk3_key_file" ##ET no phone home #if $reference_source.reference_source_selector != "history": -R "${reference_source.ref_file.fields.path}" #end if --out "${output_vcf}" ' #for $interval_count, $input_intervals in enumerate( $input_interval_repeat ): -d "--intervals" "${input_intervals.input_intervals}" "${input_intervals.input_intervals.ext}" "input_intervals_${interval_count}" #end for
##start standard gatk options #if $gatk_param_type.gatk_param_type_selector == "advanced": #include source=$standard_gatk_options# #end if
#if $reference_source.reference_source_selector == "history": -d "-R" "${reference_source.ref_file}" "${reference_source.ref_file.ext}" "gatk_input_reference_fasta" --picard_jar "/mnt/galaxyTools/tools/picard/1.121/CreateSequenceDictionary.jar" #end if ##end standard gatk options ##start analysis specific options #if $analysis_param_type.analysis_param_type_selector == "advanced": -p ' --maximum_coverage ${analysis_param_type.maximum_coverage} --minimum_base_quality ${analysis_param_type.min_base_quality} --minimum_mapping_quality ${analysis_param_type.min_mapping_quality} --maximum_insert_size ${analysis_param_type.maximum_insert_size} --bad_mate_status_threshold ${analysis_param_type.bad_mate_status_threshold} --coverage_status_threshold ${analysis_param_type.coverage_status_threshold} --excessive_coverage_status_threshold ${analysis_param_type.excessive_coverage_status_threshold} --quality_status_threshold ${analysis_param_type.quality_status_threshold} --voting_status_threshold ${analysis_param_type.voting_status_threshold} ' #end if

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool is useful for diagnosing regions with bad coverage, mapping, or read mate pairs. It analyzes each sample independently and aggregates results over intervals of interest.
------
**Inputs**
GenomeAnalysisTK: DiagnoseTargets accepts aligned BAM input files.
**Outputs**
The output is a VCF
Go `here <http://www.broadinstitute.org/gatk/guide/topic?name=intro>`_ for details on GATK file formats.
-------
**Settings**::
bad_mate_status_threshold 0.5 The proportion of the loci needed for calling BAD_MATE coverage_status_threshold 0.2 The proportion of the loci needed for calling LOW_COVERAGE and COVERAGE_GAPS excessive_coverage_status_threshold 0.2 The proportion of the loci needed for calling EXCESSIVE_COVERAGE maximum_coverage 1073741823 The maximum allowable coverage, used for calling EXCESSIVE_COVERAGE maximum_insert_size 500 The maximum allowed distance between a read and its mate minimum_base_quality 20 The minimum Base Quality that is considered for calls minimum_coverage 5 The minimum allowable coverage, used for calling LOW_COVERAGE minimum_mapping_quality 20 The minimum read mapping quality considered for calls quality_status_threshold 0.5 The proportion of the loci needed for calling POOR_QUALITY voting_status_threshold 0.5 The needed proportion of samples containing a call for the interval to adopt the call
------
